    Enclosing class:
    Syntax

    public static class Syntax.Text<Tag extends Enum<Tag> & Syntax.LanguageTag>
extends Syntax.Language<Tag>
    A language token with variable text, such as identifiers and literals.

      • getTokenText

        public String getTokenText()
        Description copied from class: Node
        Treat this node as a token and get its text. This method strips away any annotations, treats the resulting node as a token, and returns its text. User-specified classes must not override this method.
        Overrides:
        getTokenText in class Syntax.Language<Tag extends Enum<Tag> & Syntax.LanguageTag>
        Returns:
        The token's text.
        See Also:
        Node.strip()
